query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS visa_compliance_alerts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  visa_compliance_id INT NOT NULL,
  alert_type ENUM('expiring_30_days', 'expiring_15_days', 'expiring_7_days', 'expired', 'renewal_overdue') NOT NULL,
  severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') DEFAULT 'warning' NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  acknowledged TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  acknowledged_by INT,
  acknowledged_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  dismissed TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  dismissed_by INT,
  dismissed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX visa_compliance_id_idx (visa_compliance_id),
  INDEX severity_idx (severity),
  INDEX acknowledged_idx (acknowledged),
  FOREIGN KEY (visa_compliance_id) REFERENCES visa_compliance(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (acknowledged_by) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (dismissed_by) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL
)
command:

  visa_compliance_id INT NOT NULL,
  alert_type ENUM('expiring_30_days', 'expiring_15_days', 'expiring_7_days', 'expired', 'renewal_overdue') NOT NULL,

  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  acknowledged TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  acknowledged_by INT,
  acknowledged_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  dismissed TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  dismissed_by INT,
  dismissed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX visa_compliance_id_idx (visa_compliance_id),
  INDEX severity_idx (severity),
  INDEX acknowledged_idx (acknowledged),
  FOREIGN KEY (visa_compliance_id) REFERENCES visa_compliance(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (acknowledged_by) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (dismissed_by) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL
)
